net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.opengl.texture

Class SpriteSheet

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.opengl.texture.Texture
      • net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.opengl.texture.SpriteSheet

  • public class SpriteSheet
extends Texture
    Class used to create an easy interface to use SpriteSheets to get data from.
    Since:
    Apr 26, 2013 at 10:47:14 PM, v0.2
    Version:
    Jul 2, 2013 at 1:35:35 PM, v0.2
    Author:
    Braden Steffaniak

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpriteSheet(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image, int cols, int rows)
      Create a SpriteSheet from the given BufferedImage with the specified amount of columns and rows.
      SpriteSheet(java.lang.String location, int cols, int rows)
      Create a SpriteSheet from the File at the specified location with the specified amount of columns and rows.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpriteSheet

        public SpriteSheet(java.lang.String location,
           int cols,
           int rows)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Create a SpriteSheet from the File at the specified location with the specified amount of columns and rows.
        Parameters:
        location - The location of the Image File containing the SpriteSheet.
        cols - The number of columns in the SpriteSheet.
        rows - The number of rows in the SpriteSheet.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there is an error reading from the Image File at the specified location.

      • SpriteSheet

        public SpriteSheet(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
           int cols,
           int rows)
        Create a SpriteSheet from the given BufferedImage with the specified amount of columns and rows.
        Parameters:
        image - The BufferedImage instance to use to create the SpriteSheet.
        cols - The number of columns in the SpriteSheet.
        rows - The number of rows in the SpriteSheet.

    • Method Detail

      • getImageOffsets

        public float[] getImageOffsets(int x,
                      int y,
                      int cols,
                      int rows)
        Get the float offsets of the SpriteSheet for the section of the SpriteSheet located at (x, y) and that takes up the specified amount of columns and rows.
        Parameters:
        x - The horizontal location to get the offsets from. (left = 0)
        y - The vertical location to get the offsets from. (top = 0)
        cols - The number of columns to get the offsets for.
        rows - The number of rows to get the offsets for.
        Returns:
        A float array containing values used to map a Texture to a polygon.
